name: Egg Escape!
description:
Controls

W - Up

D - Down

Up Arrow - 2nd Player up

Down Arrow - 2nd Player Down

F - Full Screen

Gameplay

Single Player: Keep the eggs inside the pen until time runs out!

Multiplayer: Go head to head to keep as many eggs from leaving your side of the pasture.

This game was made using the Godot engine as a practice project. Any feedback or tips for improvement is appreciated. 

Thank you for playing!
